Fleet Safety, Uncomplicated.

We get it, running a fleet is expensive and complicated.  
  
Without SaaS fees or annual contracts, the Bee is a premium dashcam keeping
your drivers safe and secure on their daily drive.  
  
It is also the ultimate mapping dashcam, effortlessly updating the world's
freshest map to help get where you are going faster.

Contact Us

[Manage Your Fleet](https://hivemapper.com/fleet-management)

HONEY

Drive & Earn  
HONEY Rewards

Cameras capture imagery as you drive, contributing to the global map network.
Rewards are based on KM covered, map freshness, and imagery quality. Rewards
are paid weekly in [HONEY](https://www.hivemapperfoundation.org/honey) tokens

![Passive Uploads](https://hivemapper-marketing-public.s3.us-
west-2.amazonaws.com/fleets/Fleets-Webpage-PassiveMapping-Desktop-v3.png)

Passive Uploads

No app required

![Weekly Rewards](https://hivemapper-marketing-public.s3.us-
west-2.amazonaws.com/fleets/Fleets-Webpage-WeeklyRewards-Desktop-v3.png)

Weekly Rewards

Automatic deposits

![Token Splits](https://hivemapper-marketing-public.s3.us-
west-2.amazonaws.com/fleets/Fleets-Webpage-TokenSplits-Desktop-v3.png)

Token Splits

Control reward distributions
